entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 07:45 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 07:45 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
